segments.text: I'm looking at all the different hazards in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most obvious one is the overflowing sink creating a slick, wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Anyone could easily slip and fall there, especially the woman or the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the stool the boy is standing on; it's practically tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could cause a nasty bump or even a broken arm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him crashing down with the cookie jar or a plate makes me wince.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, with her hands full of dishes, is particularly vulnerable if she slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I also see other stacked dishes on the counter near her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she falls, those could come crashing down too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s remarkable how many things could go wrong in such a short moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a growing sense of unease watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to intervene before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
